managed_challenge.page_description: Managed Challenge is our smarter CAPTCHA alternative that automatically chooses from a rotating suite of non-intrusive browser challenges based on telemetry and client behavior exhibited during a session.
managed_challenge.add_challenge_page.des: Add a site to get started with Managed Challenges.
managed_challenge.add_challenge_page.for: Add a name for the site to identify it in the future
Enter your website's hostname or select from your existing websites on Cloudflare. (eg. domain.com or sub.domain.com)
managed_challenge.widget.sitekey.label: Site Key
managed_challenge.widget.secretkey.label: Secret Key
